comments:
The following exception was found in the .log file of a customer using an IBM adopter product based on WTP 1.0.2. I can provide the workspace if required, but the customer does not remember what they were doing when the internal error occured.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.xml.core 4 4 2006-09-06 18:35:56.310
!MESSAGE A structured model client threw following exception during adapter notification (STRUCUTRED_CHANGED )

Chuck, think there should just be more guards in this code? Or is this a sign of something worse?
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
